financial_benefits.description: Barbados does not impose local income tax on foreign-sourced income for digital nomads.
The Barbadian Dollar (BBD) is the local currency, providing a stable financial environment.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Enjoy a tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round.
Barbados offers a high quality of life with beautiful beaches and friendly locals.

additional_benefits.description: English is the official language, making communication easy for most expatriates.
The island has a rich culture with numerous festivals, including one of the Caribbean's most popular carnivals.

key_consideration: The 12-Month Barbados Welcome Stamp allows remote workers to live and work in Barbados for up to a year with no local tax on foreign income.
action_comment: Consider Barbados for its tropical climate, vibrant culture, and favorable tax conditions for digital nomads.
tagline: Work and live in paradise in Barbados.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you stay for longer than 183 days in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: The visa can be extended for another 12 months.

income_requirement.misc_details: Applicants must have an annual income of at least $50,000.

application_fee.details: Fee covers the main applicant, spouse, and dependents. Additional dependents may not incur extra charges.

visas.renewability_details: The visa can be extended for another 12 months.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Digital nomad visa does not lead to permanent residency.

special_regimes.name: Digital Nomad Visa
special_regimes.benefit: No income tax on foreign-sourced income.
eligibility: Proof of employment, self-employment, or freelance work that can be done remotely.
Valid police clearance from the past 6 months.
Health insurance covering the duration of stay.

required_documents: If you have a partner and/or children traveling with you: Prerequisite entry visa if not from an exempted country.

visas.key_consideration: Long term visa options for stays exceeding one year.
